name: OB_HSB_DEL_REPRSUT
description: This table contains information about the repair suture used to repair episiotomies or lacerations during the delivery for this pregnancy.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DEL_REPAIR_SUT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the repair suture type used in repairing episiotomies or lacerations during the delivery.
